data.eml:eml: Nereis alacranensis, a new species of polychaete (Annelida, Nereididae) from Alacranes Reef, southern Gulf of Mexico, with a key to Nereis from the Grand Caribbean

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ramírez-Hernández, Adriana, Hernández-Alcántara, Pablo, Solís-Weiss, Vivianne (2015): Nereis alacranensis, a new species of polychaete (Annelida, Nereididae) from Alacranes Reef, southern Gulf of Mexico, with a key to Nereis from the Grand Caribbean. Zootaxa 4012 (1): 156-166, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4012.1.8
